flow-definition.description: rb-aosp build for generic images from ci.android.com

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Google internal incremental build number that identifies each build, see https://android.googlesource.com/platform/build/+/master/Changes.md#BUILD_NUMBER"

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_TARGET
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Build target as choosen in lunch (consist of <TARGET_PRODUCT>-<TARGET_BUILD_VARIANT>"
